noun.name: toilet
noun.discription: a plumbing fixture used for the disposal of human waste

object1.name: sink
object1.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is a plumbing fixture used for washing hands, dishes, and other small items

object2.name: bathtub
object2.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is a large container for holding water in which a person may bathe

object3.name: shower
object3.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is a place where water is sprayed on the body to clean it

object4.name: urinal
object4.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is a plumbing fixture used primarily for the disposal of urine

object5.name: bidet
object5.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is a plumbing fixture used for washing the genitalia and the anus

object6.name: washing machine
object6.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is an appliance used to wash laundry

object7.name: dishwasher
object7.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is an appliance used to clean dishes and cookware

object8.name: water heater
object8.discription: in parallel with 'toilet', is a device that heats water for domestic or industrial use
